page.title: 14POLITICS
page.content: The M.P. for our area is called Douglas Hogg.He represents the Conservative Party at the Houses of Parliament.His job is to be a Member of Parliament.He says that an M.P's job,"is to express the concerns of his constituents and seek to influence and persuade."Douglas Hogg is helping the children of Branston.Their parents are worried about the number of children who use a busy narrow road to cycle to the comprehensive school.He's trying to persuade the County Council to build a cycle track between the comprehensive school and the Sheep wash bend near Washingborough.This is important because the children ride all over the road and somebody may be killed.Douglas Hogg is also involved in correspondence with the Anglian Water Authority about chemicals in the water supply.
